Name: NewSubfileType
Short description: A general indication of the kind of data contained in this subfile.
Note: Usage rule in JHOVE TIFF module.

Name: SubfileType
Short description: A general indication of the kind of data contained in this subfile.

Name: ImageWidth
Short description: The number of columns in the image, i.e., the number of pixels per row.
Note: Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1

Name: ImageLength
Short description: The number of rows of pixels in the image.
Note: Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1

Name: BitsPerSample
Short description: Number of bits per component.

Name: Compression
Short description: Compression scheme used on the image data.

Name: PhotometricInterpretation
Short description: The color space of the image data.
Note: Sample values: 1=black is zero and 2=RGB. Document also states "RGB is assumed to be sRGB; if RGB, an ICC profile should be present in the 34675 tag."

Name: Threshholding
Short description: For black and white TIFF files that represent shades of gray, the technique used to convert from gray to black and white pixels.
Note: Usage rule in JHOVE TIFF module.

Name: CellWidth
Short description: The width of the dithering or halftoning matrix used to create a dithered or halftoned bilevel file.

Name: CellLength
Short description: The length of the dithering or halftoning matrix used to create a dithered or halftoned bilevel file.
Note: Usage rule in JHOVE TIFF module.

Name: FillOrder
Short description: The logical order of bits within a byte.

Name: DocumentName
Short description: The name of the document from which this image was scanned.

Name: ImageDescription
Short description: A string that describes the subject of the image.

Name: Make
Short description: The scanner manufacturer.

Name: Model
Short description: The scanner model name or number.

Name: StripOffsets
Short description: For each strip, the byte offset of that strip.
Note: Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1 (Files outside of these classes may use tiles and tags 322, 323, 324, and 325; Comments welcome.)

Name: Orientation
Short description: The orientation of the image with respect to the rows and columns.

Name: SamplesPerPixel
Short description: The number of components per pixel.
Note: Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes R and Y.1

Name: RowsPerStrip
Short description: The number of rows per strip.
Note: Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1 (Files outside of these classes may use tiles and tags 322, 323, 324, and 325; Comments welcome.)

Name: StripByteCounts
Short description: For each strip, the number of bytes in the strip after compression.
Note: Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1 (Files outside of these classes may use tiles and tags 322, 323, 324, and 325; Comments welcome.)

Name: MinSampleValue
Short description: The minimum component value used.

Name: MaxSampleValue
Short description: The maximum component value used.

Name: XResolution
Short description: The number of pixels per ResolutionUnit in the ImageWidth direction.
Note: Xresolution is a Rational; ImageWidth (Tag 256) is the numerator and the length of the source (measured in the units specified in ResolutionUnit (Tag 296)) is the denominator.

Name: YResolution
Short description: The number of pixels per ResolutionUnit in the ImageLength direction.
Note: Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1

Name: PlanarConfiguration
Short description: How the components of each pixel are stored.

Name: PageName
Short description: The name of the page from which this image was scanned.

Name: XPosition
Short description: X position of the image.

Name: YPosition
Short description: Y position of the image.

Name: FreeOffsets
Short description: For each string of contiguous unused bytes in a TIFF file, the byte offset of the string.

Name: FreeByteCounts
Short description: For each string of contiguous unused bytes in a TIFF file, the number of bytes in the string.

Name: GrayResponseUnit
Short description: The precision of the information contained in the GrayResponseCurve.

Name: GrayResponseCurve
Short description: For grayscale data, the optical density of each possible pixel value.

Name: T4Options
Short description: Options for Group 3 Fax compression

Name: T6Options
Short description: Options for Group 4 Fax compression

Name: ResolutionUnit
Short description: The unit of measurement for XResolution and YResolution.
Note: Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1

Name: PageNumber
Short description: The page number of the page from which this image was scanned.

Name: TransferFunction
Short description: Describes a transfer function for the image in tabular style.

Name: Software
Short description: Name and version number of the software package(s) used to create the image.

Name: DateTime
Short description: Date and time of image creation.

Name: Artist
Short description: Person who created the image.

Name: HostComputer
Short description: The computer and/or operating system in use at the time of image creation.

Name: Predictor
Short description: A mathematical operator that is applied to the image data before an encoding scheme is applied.

Name: WhitePoint
Short description: The chromaticity of the white point of the image.

Name: PrimaryChromaticities
Short description: The chromaticities of the primaries of the image.

Name: ColorMap
Short description: A color map for palette color images.

Name: HalftoneHints
Short description: Conveys to the halftone function the range of gray levels within a colorimetrically-specified image that should retain tonal detail.

Name: TileWidth
Short description: The tile width in pixels. This is the number of columns in each tile.
Note: Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 files that use tiles. (Files that use strips employ tags 273, 278, and 279.)

Name: TileLength
Short description: The tile length (height) in pixels. This is the number of rows in each tile.
Note: Referenced in JHOVE TIFF module for files that use tiles. (Files that use strips employ tags 273, 278, and 279.)

Name: TileOffsets
Short description: For each tile, the byte offset of that tile, as compressed and stored on disk.
Note: Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 files that use tiles. (Files that use strips employ tags 273, 278, and 279.)

Name: TileByteCounts
Short description: For each tile, the number of (compressed) bytes in that tile.
Note: Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 files that use tiles. (Files that use strips employ tags 273, 278, and 279.)

Name: BadFaxLines
Short description: Used in the TIFF-F standard, denotes the number of 'bad' scan lines encountered by the facsimile device.

Name: CleanFaxData
Short description: Used in the TIFF-F standard, indicates if 'bad' lines encountered during reception are stored in the data, or if 'bad' lines have been replaced by the receiver.

Name: ConsecutiveBadFaxLines
Short description: Used in the TIFF-F standard, denotes the maximum number of consecutive 'bad' scanlines received.

Name: SubIFDs
Short description: Offset to child IFDs.

Name: InkSet
Short description: The set of inks used in a separated (PhotometricInterpretation=5) image.

Name: InkNames
Short description: The name of each ink used in a separated image.

Name: NumberOfInks
Short description: The number of inks.

Name: DotRange
Short description: The component values that correspond to a 0% dot and 100% dot.
Note: Usage rule in JHOVE TIFF module.

Name: TargetPrinter
Short description: A description of the printing environment for which this separation is intended.

Name: ExtraSamples
Short description: Description of extra components.

Name: SampleFormat
Short description: Specifies how to interpret each data sample in a pixel.

Name: SMinSampleValue
Short description: Specifies the minimum sample value.

Name: SMaxSampleValue
Short description: Specifies the maximum sample value.

Name: TransferRange
Short description: Expands the range of the TransferFunction.

Name: ClipPath
Short description: Mirrors the essentials of PostScript's path creation functionality.
Note: Usage rule in JHOVE TIFF module.

Name: XClipPathUnits
Short description: The number of units that span the width of the image, in terms of integer ClipPath coordinates.
Note: Usage rule in JHOVE TIFF module.

Name: YClipPathUnits
Short description: The number of units that span the height of the image, in terms of integer ClipPath coordinates.

Name: Indexed
Short description: Aims to broaden the support for indexed images to include support for any color space.

Name: JPEGTables
Short description: JPEG quantization and/or Huffman tables.

Name: OPIProxy
Short description: OPI-related.

Name: GlobalParametersIFD
Short description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard to point to an IFD containing tags that are globally applicable to the complete TIFF file.

Name: ProfileType
Short description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the type of data stored in this file or IFD.

Name: FaxProfile
Short description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the 'profile' that applies to this file.

Name: CodingMethods
Short description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, indicates which coding methods are used in the file.

Name: VersionYear
Short description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the year of the standard specified by the FaxProfile field.

Name: ModeNumber
Short description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the mode of the standard specified by the FaxProfile field.

Name: Decode
Short description: Used in the TIFF-F and TIFF-FX standards, holds information about the ITULAB (PhotometricInterpretation = 10) encoding.

Name: DefaultImageColor
Short description: Defined in the Mixed Raster Content part of RFC 2301, is the default color needed in areas where no image is available.

Name: JPEGProc
Short description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

Name: JPEGInterchangeFormat
Short description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

Name: JPEGInterchangeFormatLength
Short description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

Name: JPEGRestartInterval
Short description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

Name: JPEGLosslessPredictors
Short description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

Name: JPEGPointTransforms
Short description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

Name: JPEGQTables
Short description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

Name: JPEGDCTables
Short description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

Name: JPEGACTables
Short description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

Name: YCbCrCoefficients
Short description: The transformation from RGB to YCbCr image data.

Name: YCbCrSubSampling
Short description: Specifies the subsampling factors used for the chrominance components of a YCbCr image.

Name: YCbCrPositioning
Short description: Specifies the positioning of subsampled chrominance components relative to luminance samples.

Name: ReferenceBlackWhite
Short description: Specifies a pair of headroom and footroom image data values (codes) for each pixel component.

Name: StripRowCounts
Short description: Defined in the Mixed Raster Content part of RFC 2301, used to replace RowsPerStrip for IFDs with variable-sized strips.

Name: XMP
Short description: XML packet containing XMP metadata

Name: Image.Rating
Short description: Ratings tag used by Windows

Name: Image.RatingPercent
Short description: Ratings tag used by Windows, value as percent

Name: ImageID
Short description: OPI-related.

Name: Wang Annotation
Short description: Annotation data, as used in 'Imaging for Windows'.

Name: CFARepeatPatternDim
Short description: For camera raw files from sensors with CFA overlay.

Name: CFAPattern
Short description: For camera raw files from sensors with CFA overlay.

Name: BatteryLevel
Short description: Encodes camera battery level at time of image capture.

Name: Copyright
Short description: Copyright notice.

Name: ExposureTime
Short description: Exposure time, given in seconds.

Name: FNumber
Short description: The F number.

Name: MD FileTag
Short description: Specifies the pixel data format encoding in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

Name: MD ScalePixel
Short description: Specifies a scale factor in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

Name: MD ColorTable
Short description: Used to specify the conversion from 16bit to 8bit in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

Name: MD LabName
Short description: Name of the lab that scanned this file, as used in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

Name: MD SampleInfo
Short description: Information about the sample, as used in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

Name: MD PrepDate
Short description: Date the sample was prepared, as used in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

Name: MD PrepTime
Short description: Time the sample was prepared, as used in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

Name: MD FileUnits
Short description: Units for data in this file, as used in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

Name: ModelPixelScaleTag
Short description: Used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.

Name: IPTC/NAA
Short description: IPTC-NAA (International Press Telecommunications Council-Newspaper Association of America) metadata.
Note: Tag name and values defined by IPTC-NAA Info Interchange Model & Digital Newsphoto Parameter Record.

Name: INGR Packet Data Tag
Short description: Intergraph Application specific storage.

Name: INGR Flag Registers
Short description: Intergraph Application specific flags.

Name: IrasB Transformation Matrix
Short description: Originally part of Intergraph's GeoTIFF tags, but likely understood by IrasB only.

Name: ModelTiepointTag
Short description: Originally part of Intergraph's GeoTIFF tags, but now used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.
Note: In GeoTIFF_1_0, either this tag or 34264 must be defined, but not both

Name: Site
Short description: Site where image created.

Name: ColorSequence
Short description: Sequence of colors if other than CMYK.

Name: IT8Header
Short description: Certain inherited headers.

Name: RasterPadding
Short description: Type of raster padding used, if any.

Name: BitsPerRunLength
Short description: Number of bits for short run length encoding.

Name: BitsPerExtendedRunLength
Short description: Number of bits for long run length encoding.

Name: ColorTable
Short description: Color value in a color pallette.

Name: ImageColorIndicator
Short description: Indicates if image (foreground) color or transparency is specified.
Note: For MP, BP, and BL only2

Name: BackgroundColorIndicator
Short description: Background color specification.

Name: ImageColorValue
Short description: Specifies image (foreground) color.
Note: For MP, BP, and BL only2

Name: BackgroundColorValue
Short description: Specifies background color.

Name: PixelIntensityRange
Short description: Specifies data values for 0 percent and 100 percent pixel intensity.

Name: TransparencyIndicator
Short description: Specifies if transparency is used in HC file.

Name: ColorCharacterization
Short description: Specifies ASCII table or other reference per ISO 12641 and ISO 12642.

Name: HCUsage
Short description: Indicates the type of information in an HC file.

Name: TrapIndicator
Short description: Indicates whether or not trapping has been applied to the file.

Name: CMYKEquivalent
Short description: Specifies CMYK equivalent for specific separations.

Name: Reserved
Short description: For future TIFF/IT use

Name: Reserved
Short description: For future TIFF/IT use

Name: Reserved
Short description: For future TIFF/IT use

Name: ModelTransformationTag
Short description: Used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.
Note: In GeoTIFF_1_0, either this tag or 33922 must be defined, but not both

Name: Photoshop
Short description: Collection of Photoshop 'Image Resource Blocks'.

Name: Exif IFD
Short description: A pointer to the Exif IFD.

Name: InterColorProfile
Short description: ICC profile data.

Name: ImageLayer
Short description: Defined in the Mixed Raster Content part of RFC 2301, used to denote the particular function of this Image in the mixed raster scheme.

Name: GeoKeyDirectoryTag
Short description: Used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.

Name: GeoDoubleParamsTag
Short description: Used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.

Name: GeoAsciiParamsTag
Short description: Used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.

Name: ExposureProgram
Short description: The class of the program used by the camera to set exposure when the picture is taken.

Name: SpectralSensitivity
Short description: Indicates the spectral sensitivity of each channel of the camera used.

Name: GPSInfo
Short description: A pointer to the Exif-related GPS Info IFD.

Name: ISOSpeedRatings
Short description: Indicates the ISO Speed and ISO Latitude of the camera or input device as specified in ISO 12232.

Name: OECF
Short description: Indicates the Opto-Electric Conversion Function (OECF) specified in ISO 14524.

Name: Interlace
Short description: Indicates the field number of multifield images.

Name: TimeZoneOffset
Short description: Encodes time zone of camera clock relative to GMT.

Name: SelfTimeMode
Short description: Number of seconds image capture was delayed from button press.

Name: SensitivityType
Short description: The SensitivityType tag indicates PhotographicSensitivity tag, which one of the parameters of ISO 12232. Although it is an optional tag, it should be recorded when a PhotographicSensitivity tag is recorded. Value = 4, 5, 6, or 7 may be used in case that the values of plural parameters are the same.

Name: StandardOutputSensitivity
Short description: This tag indicates the standard output sensitivity value of a camera or input device defined in ISO 12232. When recording this tag, the PhotographicSensitivity and SensitivityType tags shall also be recorded.

Name: RecommendedExposureIndex
Short description: This tag indicates the recommended exposure index value of a camera or input device defined in ISO 12232. When recording this tag, the PhotographicSensitivity and SensitivityType tags shall also be recorded.

Name: ISOSpeed
Short description: This tag indicates the ISO speed value of a camera or input device that is defined in ISO 12232. When recording this tag, the PhotographicSensitivity and SensitivityType tags shall also be recorded.

Name: ISOSpeedLatitudeyyy
Short description: This tag indicates the ISO speed latitude yyy value of a camera or input device that is defined in ISO 12232. However, this tag shall not be recorded without ISOSpeed and ISOSpeedLatitudezzz.

Name: ISOSpeedLatitudezzz
Short description: This tag indicates the ISO speed latitude zzz value of a camera or input device that is defined in ISO 12232. However, this tag shall not be recorded without ISOSpeed and ISOSpeedLatitudeyyy.

Name: HylaFAX FaxRecvParams
Short description: Used by HylaFAX.

Name: HylaFAX FaxSubAddress
Short description: Used by HylaFAX.

Name: HylaFAX FaxRecvTime
Short description: Used by HylaFAX.

Name: ExifVersion
Short description: The version of the supported Exif standard.

Name: DateTimeOriginal
Short description: The date and time when the original image data was generated.

Name: DateTimeDigitized
Short description: The date and time when the image was stored as digital data.

Name: ComponentsConfiguration
Short description: Specific to compressed data; specifies the channels and complements PhotometricInterpretation

Name: CompressedBitsPerPixel
Short description: Specific to compressed data; states the compressed bits per pixel.

Name: ShutterSpeedValue
Short description: Shutter speed.

Name: ApertureValue
Short description: The lens aperture.

Name: BrightnessValue
Short description: The value of brightness.

Name: ExposureBiasValue
Short description: The exposure bias.

Name: MaxApertureValue
Short description: The smallest F number of the lens.

Name: SubjectDistance
Short description: The distance to the subject, given in meters.

Name: MeteringMode
Short description: The metering mode.

Name: LightSource
Short description: The kind of light source.

Name: Flash
Short description: Indicates the status of flash when the image was shot.

Name: FocalLength
Short description: The actual focal length of the lens, in mm.

Name: FlashEnergy
Short description: Amount of flash energy (BCPS).

Name: SpatialFrequencyResponse
Short description: SFR of the camera.

Name: Noise
Short description: Noise measurement values.

Name: FocalPlaneXResolution
Short description: Number of pixels per FocalPlaneResolutionUnit (37392) in ImageWidth direction for main image.

Name: FocalPlaneYResolution
Short description: Number of pixels per FocalPlaneResolutionUnit (37392) in ImageLength direction for main image.

Name: FocalPlaneResolutionUnit
Short description: Unit of measurement for FocalPlaneXResolution(37390) and FocalPlaneYResolution(37391).

Name: ImageNumber
Short description: Number assigned to an image, e.g., in a chained image burst.

Name: SecurityClassification
Short description: Security classification assigned to the image.

Name: ImageHistory
Short description: Record of what has been done to the image.

Name: SubjectLocation
Short description: Indicates the location and area of the main subject in the overall scene.

Name: ExposureIndex
Short description: Encodes the camera exposure index setting when image was captured.

Name: TIFF/EPStandardID
Short description: For current spec, tag value equals 1 0 0 0.

Name: SensingMethod
Short description: Type of image sensor.

Name: MakerNote
Short description: Manufacturer specific information.

Name: UserComment
Short description: Keywords or comments on the image; complements ImageDescription.

Name: SubsecTime
Short description: A tag used to record fractions of seconds for the DateTime tag.

Name: SubsecTimeOriginal
Short description: A tag used to record fractions of seconds for the DateTimeOriginal tag.

Name: SubsecTimeDigitized
Short description: A tag used to record fractions of seconds for the DateTimeDigitized tag.

Name: ImageSourceData
Short description: Used by Adobe Photoshop.

Name: XPTitle
Short description: Title tag used by Windows, encoded in UCS2

Name: XPComment
Short description: Comment tag used by Windows, encoded in UCS2

Name: XPAuthor
Short description: Author tag used by Windows, encoded in UCS2

Name: XPKeywords
Short description: Keywords tag used by Windows, encoded in UCS2

Name: XPSubject
Short description: Subject tag used by Windows, encoded in UCS2

Name: FlashpixVersion
Short description: The Flashpix format version supported by a FPXR file.

Name: ColorSpace
Short description: The color space information tag is always recorded as the color space specifier.

Name: PixelXDimension
Short description: Specific to compressed data; the valid width of the meaningful image.

Name: PixelYDimension
Short description: Specific to compressed data; the valid height of the meaningful image.

Name: RelatedSoundFile
Short description: Used to record the name of an audio file related to the image data.

Name: Interoperability IFD
Short description: A pointer to the Exif-related Interoperability IFD.

Name: FlashEnergy
Short description: Indicates the strobe energy at the time the image is captured, as measured in Beam Candle Power Seconds

Name: SpatialFrequencyResponse
Short description: Records the camera or input device spatial frequency table and SFR values in the direction of image width, image height, and diagonal direction, as specified in ISO 12233.

Name: FocalPlaneXResolution
Short description: Indicates the number of pixels in the image width (X) direction per FocalPlaneResolutionUnit on the camera focal plane.

Name: FocalPlaneYResolution
Short description: Indicates the number of pixels in the image height (Y) direction per FocalPlaneResolutionUnit on the camera focal plane.

Name: FocalPlaneResolutionUnit
Short description: Indicates the unit for measuring FocalPlaneXResolution and FocalPlaneYResolution.

Name: SubjectLocation
Short description: Indicates the location of the main subject in the scene.

Name: ExposureIndex
Short description: Indicates the exposure index selected on the camera or input device at the time the image is captured.

Name: SensingMethod
Short description: Indicates the image sensor type on the camera or input device.

Name: FileSource
Short description: Indicates the image source.

Name: SceneType
Short description: Indicates the type of scene.

Name: CFAPattern
Short description: Indicates the color filter array (CFA) geometric pattern of the image sensor when a one-chip color area sensor is used.

Name: CustomRendered
Short description: Indicates the use of special processing on image data, such as rendering geared to output.

Name: ExposureMode
Short description: Indicates the exposure mode set when the image was shot.

Name: WhiteBalance
Short description: Indicates the white balance mode set when the image was shot.

Name: DigitalZoomRatio
Short description: Indicates the digital zoom ratio when the image was shot.

Name: FocalLengthIn35mmFilm
Short description: Indicates the equivalent focal length assuming a 35mm film camera, in mm.

Name: SceneCaptureType
Short description: Indicates the type of scene that was shot.

Name: GainControl
Short description: Indicates the degree of overall image gain adjustment.

Name: Contrast
Short description: Indicates the direction of contrast processing applied by the camera when the image was shot.

Name: Saturation
Short description: Indicates the direction of saturation processing applied by the camera when the image was shot.

Name: Sharpness
Short description: Indicates the direction of sharpness processing applied by the camera when the image was shot.

Name: DeviceSettingDescription
Short description: This tag indicates information on the picture-taking conditions of a particular camera model.

Name: SubjectDistanceRange
Short description: Indicates the distance to the subject.

Name: ImageUniqueID
Short description: Indicates an identifier assigned uniquely to each image.

Name: CameraOwnerName
Short description: Camera owner name as ASCII string.

Name: BodySerialNumber
Short description: Camera body serial number as ASCII string.

Name: LensSpecification
Short description: This tag notes minimum focal length, maximum focal length, minimum F number in the minimum focal length, and minimum F number in the maximum focal length, which are specification information for the lens that was used in photography. When the minimum F number is unknown, the notation is 0/0.

Name: LensMake
Short description: Lens manufacturer name as ASCII string.

Name: LensModel
Short description: Lens model name and number as ASCII string.

Name: LensSerialNumber
Short description: Lens serial number as ASCII string.

Name: GDAL_METADATA
Short description: Used by the GDAL library, holds an XML list of name=value 'metadata' values about the image as a whole, and about specific samples.

Name: GDAL_NODATA
Short description: Used by the GDAL library, contains an ASCII encoded nodata or background pixel value.

Name: PixelFormat
Short description: A 128-bit Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) that identifies the image pixel format.

Name: Transformation
Short description: Specifies the transformation to be applied when decoding the image to present the desired representation.

Name: Uncompressed
Short description: Specifies that image data is uncompressed.

Name: ImageType
Short description: Specifies the image type of each individual frame in a multi-frame file.

Name: ImageWidth
Short description: Specifies the number of columns in the transformed photo, or the number of pixels per scan line.

Name: ImageHeight
Short description: Specifies the number of pixels or scan lines in the transformed photo.

Name: WidthResolution
Short description: Specifies the horizontal resolution of a transformed image expressed in pixels per inch.

Name: HeightResolution
Short description: Specifies the vertical resolution of a transformed image expressed in pixels per inch.

Name: ImageOffset
Short description: Specifies the byte offset pointer to the beginning of the photo data, relative to the beginning of the file.

Name: ImageByteCount
Short description: Specifies the size of the photo in bytes.

Name: AlphaOffset
Short description: Specifies the byte offset pointer the beginning of the planar alpha channel data, relative to the beginning of the file.

Name: AlphaByteCount
Short description: Specifies the size of the alpha channel data in bytes.

Name: ImageDataDiscard
Short description: Signifies the level of data that has been discarded from the image as a result of a compressed domain transcode to reduce the file size.

Name: AlphaDataDiscard
Short description: Signifies the level of data that has been discarded from the planar alpha channel as a result of a compressed domain transcode to reduce the file size.

Name: ImageType
Short description: Specifies the image type of each individual frame in a multi-frame file.

Name: Oce Scanjob Description
Short description: Used in the Oce scanning process.

Name: Oce Application Selector
Short description: Used in the Oce scanning process.

Name: Oce Identification Number
Short description: Used in the Oce scanning process.

Name: Oce ImageLogic Characteristics
Short description: Used in the Oce scanning process.

Name: PrintImageMatching
Short description: Description needed.

Name: DNGVersion
Short description: Encodes DNG four-tier version number; for version 1.1.0.0, the tag contains the bytes 1, 1, 0, 0. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: DNGBackwardVersion
Short description: Defines oldest version of spec with which file is compatible. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: UniqueCameraModel
Short description: Unique, non-localized nbame for camera model. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: LocalizedCameraModel
Short description: Similar to 50708, with localized camera name. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: CFAPlaneColor
Short description: Mapping between values in the CFAPattern tag and the plane numbers in LinearRaw space. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: CFALayout
Short description: Spatial layout of the CFA. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: LinearizationTable
Short description: Lookup table that maps stored values to linear values. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: BlackLevelRepeatDim
Short description: Repeat pattern size for BlackLevel tag. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: BlackLevel
Short description: Specifies the zero light encoding level.Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: BlackLevelDeltaH
Short description: Specifies the difference between zero light encoding level for each column and the baseline zero light encoding level. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: BlackLevelDeltaV
Short description: Specifies the difference between zero light encoding level for each row and the baseline zero light encoding level. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: WhiteLevel
Short description: Specifies the fully saturated encoding level for the raw sample values. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: DefaultScale
Short description: For cameras with non-square pixels, specifies the default scale factors for each direction to convert the image to square pixels. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: DefaultCropOrigin
Short description: Specifies the origin of the final image area, ignoring the extra pixels at edges used to prevent interpolation artifacts. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: DefaultCropSize
Short description: Specifies size of final image area in raw image coordinates. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: ColorMatrix1
Short description: Defines a transformation matrix that converts XYZ values to reference camera native color space values, under the first calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: ColorMatrix2
Short description: Defines a transformation matrix that converts XYZ values to reference camera native color space values, under the second calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: CameraCalibration1
Short description: Defines a calibration matrix that transforms reference camera native space values to individual camera native space values under the first calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: CameraCalibration2
Short description: Defines a calibration matrix that transforms reference camera native space values to individual camera native space values under the second calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: ReductionMatrix1
Short description: Defines a dimensionality reduction matrix for use as the first stage in converting color camera native space values to XYZ values, under the first calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: ReductionMatrix2
Short description: Defines a dimensionality reduction matrix for use as the first stage in converting color camera native space values to XYZ values, under the second calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: AnalogBalance
Short description: Pertaining to white balance, defines the gain, either analog or digital, that has been applied to the stored raw values. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: AsShotNeutral
Short description: Specifies the selected white balance at the time of capture, encoded as the coordinates of a perfectly neutral color in linear reference space values. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: AsShotWhiteXY
Short description: Specifies the selected white balance at the time of capture, encoded as x-y chromaticity coordinates. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: BaselineExposure
Short description: Specifies in EV units how much to move the zero point for exposure compensation. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: BaselineNoise
Short description: Specifies the relative noise of the camera model at a baseline ISO value of 100, compared to reference camera model. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: BaselineSharpness
Short description: Specifies the relative amount of sharpening required for this camera model, compared to reference camera model. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: BayerGreenSplit
Short description: For CFA images, specifies, in arbitrary units, how closely the values of the green pixels in the blue/green rows track the values of the green pixels in the red/green rows. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: LinearResponseLimit
Short description: Specifies the fraction of the encoding range above which the response may become significantly non-linear. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: CameraSerialNumber
Short description: Serial number of camera. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: LensInfo
Short description: Information about the lens. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: ChromaBlurRadius
Short description: Normally for non-CFA images, provides a hint about how much chroma blur ought to be applied. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: AntiAliasStrength
Short description: Provides a hint about the strength of the camera's anti-aliasing filter. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: ShadowScale
Short description: Used by Adobe Camera Raw to control sensitivity of its shadows slider. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: DNGPrivateData
Short description: Provides a way for camera manufacturers to store private data in DNG files for use by their own raw convertors. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: MakerNoteSafety
Short description: Lets the DNG reader know whether the Exif MakerNote tag is safe to preserve. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: CalibrationIlluminant1
Short description: Illuminant used for first set of calibration tags. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: CalibrationIlluminant2
Short description: Illuminant used for second set of calibration tags. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: BestQualityScale
Short description: Specifies the amount by which the values of the DefaultScale tag need to be multiplied to achieve best quality image size. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: RawDataUniqueID
Short description: Contains a 16-byte unique identifier for the raw image file in the DNG file. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: Alias Layer Metadata
Short description: Alias Sketchbook Pro layer usage description.

Name: OriginalRawFileName
Short description: Name of original file if the DNG file results from conversion from a non-DNG raw file. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: OriginalRawFileData
Short description: If the DNG file was converted from a non-DNG raw file, then this tag contains the original raw data. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: ActiveArea
Short description: Defines the active (non-masked) pixels of the sensor. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: MaskedAreas
Short description: List of non-overlapping rectangle coordinates of fully masked pixels, which can optimally be used by DNG readers to measure the black encoding level. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: AsShotICCProfile
Short description: Contains ICC profile that, in conjunction with the AsShotPreProfileMatrix tag, specifies a default color rendering from camera color space coordinates (linear reference values) into the ICC profile connection space. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: AsShotPreProfileMatrix
Short description: Specifies a matrix that should be applied to the camera color space coordinates before processing the values through the ICC profile specified in the AsShotICCProfile tag. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: CurrentICCProfile
Short description: The CurrentICCProfile and CurrentPreProfileMatrix tags have the same purpose and usage as

Name: CurrentPreProfileMatrix
Short description: The CurrentICCProfile and CurrentPreProfileMatrix tags have the same purpose and usage as

Name: ColorimetricReference
Short description: The DNG color model documents a transform between camera colors and CIE XYZ values. This tag describes the colorimetric reference for the CIE XYZ values. 0 = The XYZ values are scene-referred. 1 = The XYZ values are output-referred, using the ICC profile perceptual dynamic range. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: CameraCalibrationSignature
Short description: A UTF-8 encoded string associated with the CameraCalibration1 and CameraCalibration2 tags. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: ProfileCalibrationSignature
Short description: A UTF-8 encoded string associated with the camera profile tags. Used in IFD 0 or CameraProfile IFD of DNG files.

Name: ExtraCameraProfiles
Short description: A list of file offsets to extra Camera Profile IFDs. The format of a camera profile begins with a 16-bit byte order mark (MM or II) followed by a 16-bit "magic" number equal to 0x4352 (CR), a 32-bit IFD offset, and then a standard TIFF format IFD. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: NoiseReductionApplied
Short description: Indicates how much noise reduction has been applied to the raw data on a scale of 0.0 to 1.0. A 0.0 value indicates that no noise reduction has been applied. A 1.0 value indicates that the "ideal" amount of noise reduction has been applied, i.e. that the DNG reader should not apply additional noise reduction by default. A value of 0/0 indicates that this parameter is unknown. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: ProfileName
Short description: A UTF-8 encoded string containing the name of the camera profile. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.

Name: ProfileHueSatMapDims
Short description: Specifies the number of input samples in each dimension of the hue/saturation/value mapping tables. The data for these tables are stored in ProfileHueSatMapData1 and ProfileHueSatMapData2 tags. Allowed values include the following: HueDivisions >= 1; SaturationDivisions >= 2; ValueDivisions >=1. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.

Name: ProfileHueSatMapData1
Short description: Contains the data for the first hue/saturation/value mapping table. Each entry of the table contains three 32-bit IEEE floating-point values. The first entry is hue shift in degrees; the second entry is saturation scale factor; and the third entry is a value scale factor. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.

Name: ProfileHueSatMapData2
Short description: Contains the data for the second hue/saturation/value mapping table. Each entry of the table contains three 32-bit IEEE floating-point values. The first entry is hue shift in degrees; the second entry is saturation scale factor; and the third entry is a value scale factor. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.

Name: ProfileToneCurve
Short description: Contains a default tone curve that can be applied while processing the image as a starting point for user adjustments. The curve is specified as a list of 32-bit IEEE floating-point value pairs in linear gamma. Each sample has an input value in the range of 0.0 to 1.0, and an output value in the range of 0.0 to 1.0. The first sample is required to be (0.0, 0.0), and the last sample is required to be (1.0, 1.0). Interpolated the curve using a cubic spline. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.

Name: ProfileEmbedPolicy
Short description: Contains information about the usage rules for the associated camera profile. The valid values and meanings are: 0 = ?ǣallow copying?ǥ; 1 = ?ǣembed if used?ǥ; 2 = ?ǣembed never?ǥ; and 3 = ?ǣno restrictions?ǥ. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.

Name: ProfileCopyright
Short description: Contains information about the usage rules for the associated camera profile. The valid values and meanings are: 0 = ?ǣallow copying?ǥ; 1 = ?ǣembed if used?ǥ; 2 = ?ǣembed never?ǥ; and 3 = ?ǣno restrictions?ǥ. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.

Name: ForwardMatrix1
Short description: Defines a matrix that maps white balanced camera colors to XYZ D50 colors. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.

Name: ForwardMatrix2
Short description: Defines a matrix that maps white balanced camera colors to XYZ D50 colors. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.

Name: PreviewApplicationName
Short description: A UTF-8 encoded string containing the name of the application that created the preview stored in the IFD. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.

Name: PreviewApplicationVersion
Short description: A UTF-8 encoded string containing the version number of the application that created the preview stored in the IFD. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.

Name: PreviewSettingsName
Short description: A UTF-8 encoded string containing the name of the conversion settings (for example, snapshot name) used for the preview stored in the IFD. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.

Name: PreviewSettingsDigest
Short description: A unique ID of the conversion settings (for example, MD5 digest) used to render the preview stored in the IFD. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.

Name: PreviewColorSpace
Short description: This tag specifies the color space in which the rendered preview in this IFD is stored. The valid values include: 0 = Unknown; 1 = Gray Gamma 2.2; 2 = sRGB; 3 = Adobe RGB; and 4 = ProPhoto RGB. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.

Name: PreviewDateTime
Short description: This tag is an ASCII string containing the name of the date/time at which the preview stored in the IFD was rendered, encoded using ISO 8601 format. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.

Name: RawImageDigest
Short description: MD5 digest of the raw image data. All pixels in the image are processed in row-scan order. Each pixel is zero padded to 16 or 32 bits deep (16-bit for data less than or equal to 16 bits deep, 32-bit otherwise). The data is processed in little-endian byte order. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: OriginalRawFileDigest
Short description: MD5 digest of the data stored in the OriginalRawFileData tag. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

Name: SubTileBlockSize
Short description: Normally, pixels within a tile are stored in simple row-scan order. This tag specifies that the pixels within a tile should be grouped first into rectangular blocks of the specified size. These blocks are stored in row-scan order. Within each block, the pixels are stored in row-scan order. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: RowInterleaveFactor
Short description: Specifies that rows of the image are stored in interleaved order. The value of the tag specifies the number of interleaved fields. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: ProfileLookTableDims
Short description: Specifies the number of input samples in each dimension of a default "look" table. The data for this table is stored in the ProfileLookTableData tag. Allowed values include: HueDivisions >= 1; SaturationDivisions >= 2; and ValueDivisions >= 1. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.

Name: ProfileLookTableData
Short description: Default "look" table that can be applied while processing the image as a starting point for user adjustment. This table uses the same format as the tables stored in the ProfileHueSatMapData1 and ProfileHueSatMapData2 tags, and is applied in the same color space. However, it should be applied later in the processing pipe, after any exposure compensation and/or fill light stages, but before any tone curve stage. Each entry of the table contains three 32-bit IEEE floating-point values. The first entry is hue shift in degrees, the second entry is a saturation scale factor, and the third entry is a value scale factor. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.

Name: OpcodeList1
Short description: Specifies the list of opcodes (image processing operation codes) that should be applied to the raw image, as read directly from the file. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: OpcodeList2
Short description: Specifies the list of opcodes (image processing operation codes) that should be applied to the raw image, just after it has been mapped to linear reference values. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: OpcodeList3
Short description: Specifies the list of opcodes (image processing operation codes) that should be applied to the raw image, just after it has been demosaiced. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: NoiseProfile
Short description: Describes the amount of noise in a raw image; models the amount of signal-dependent photon (shot) noise and signal-independent sensor readout noise, two common sources of noise in raw images. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.

Name: OriginalDefaultFinalSize
Short description: If this file is a proxy for a larger original DNG file, this tag specifics the default final size of the larger original file from which this proxy was generated. The default value for this tag is default final size of the current DNG file, which is DefaultCropSize * DefaultScale.

Name: OriginalBestQualityFinalSize
Short description: If this file is a proxy for a larger original DNG file, this tag specifics the best quality final size of the larger original file from which this proxy was generated. The default value for this tag is the OriginalDefaultFinalSize, if specified. Otherwise the default value for this tag is the best quality size of the current DNG file, which is DefaultCropSize * DefaultScale * BestQualityScale.

Name: OriginalDefaultCropSize
Short description: If this file is a proxy for a larger original DNG file, this tag specifics the DefaultCropSize of the larger original file from which this proxy was generated. The default value for this tag is the OriginalDefaultFinalSize, if specified. Otherwise, the default value for this tag is the DefaultCropSize of the current DNG file.

Name: ProfileHueSatMapEncoding
Short description: Provides a way for color profiles to specify how indexing into a 3D HueSatMap is performed during raw conversion. This tag is not applicable to 2.5D HueSatMap tables (i.e., where the Value dimension is 1). The currently defined values are: 0 = Linear encoding (method described in DNG spec); 1 = sRGB encoding (method described in DNG spec).

Name: ProfileLookTableEncoding
Short description: Provides a way for color profiles to specify how indexing into a 3D LookTable is performed during raw conversion. This tag is not applicable to a 2.5D LookTable (i.e., where the Value dimension is 1). The currently defined values are: 0 = Linear encoding (method described in DNG spec); 1 = sRGB encoding (method described in DNG spec).

Name: BaselineExposureOffset
Short description: Provides a way for color profiles to increase or decrease exposure during raw conversion. BaselineExposureOffset specifies the amount (in EV units) to add to th e BaselineExposure tag during image rendering. For example, if the BaselineExposure value fo r a given camera model is +0.3, and the BaselineExposureOffset value for a given camera profile used to render an image for that camera model is -0.7, then th e actual default exposure value used during rendering will be +0.3 - 0.7 = -0.4.

Name: DefaultBlackRender
Short description: This optional tag in a color profile provides a hint to the raw converter regarding how to handle the black point (e.g., flare subtraction) during rendering. The currently defined values are: 0 = Auto; 1 = None. If set to Auto, the raw converter should perform black subtraction during rendering. The amount and method of black subtraction may be automatically determined and may be image-dependent. If set to None, the raw converter should not perform any black subtraction during rendering. This may be desirable when using color lookup tables (e.g., LookTable) or tone curves in camera profiles to perform a fixed, consistent level of black subtraction.

Name: NewRawImageDigest
Short description: This tag is a modified MD5 digest of the raw image data. It has been updated from the algorithm used to compute the RawImageDigest tag be more multi-processor friendly, and to support lossy compression algorithms. The details of the algorithm used to compute this tag are documented in the Adobe DNG SDK source code.

Name: RawToPreviewGain
Short description: The gain (what number the sample values are multiplied by) between the main raw IFD and the preview IFD containing this tag.

Name: DefaultUserCrop
Short description: Specifies a default user crop rectangle in relative coordinates. The values must satisfy: 0.0 <= top < bottom <= 1.0; 0.0 <= left < right <= 1.0. The default values of (top = 0, left = 0, bottom = 1, right = 1) correspond exactly to the default crop rectangle (as specified by the DefaultCropOrigin and DefaultCropSize tags).
